MessageSubject: Welcome to SIIWII Portal, {param1} invited you to join SIIWII Portal
MessageBody:
Hello,

We've given you access to our portal so that you can manage your journey with us and get to know all the possibilities offered by {param1}-product/service.

If you want to create an account, please click on the following link: {param2}/account/select-edition?tenantid={param3}

This link will direct you to the SIIWII Portal Registration page.

See you there!

Kind Regards,

SIIWII Portal-{param1}
